sentences.sContent: You have made me what I am.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have made me what I am.
sentences.sCn: 你使我成了我现在这个样子。

sentences.sContent: I cannot express to you how grateful I am.
sentences.sContent_eng: I cannot express to you how grateful I am.
sentences.sCn: 我无法向你表达我是多么感激。

phrases.pCn: abbr. 泛美航空公司（Pan American World Airways）

trans.tranCn: 调频，调谐，调幅（ amplitude modulation）

trans.tranOther: the first person singular of the present tense of the verb  be

trans.tranCn: （与v-ing连用构成现在进行时，与v-ed连用构成被动语态）
